name: 4Ever Tea Tree Oil Face Wash
description: This gentle yet effective face wash removes dirt, grime and oily residue to give healthy, smooth and acne free fresh skin. The natural acne riding ingredients of tea tree oil, nut grass and neem also help to remove blackheads & whiteheads. Regular wash helps to prevent bacteria from affecting the pores and restore the pH of the skin. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
